Translate

# Translate

## Usage

Please refer to the documentation on the Tailwind CSS website

## Compatibility

| Class                   | Support        |
| ----------------------- | -------------- |
| ```
translate-x-{n}
``` | ✅ Full Support |
| ```
translate-x-[n]
``` | ✅ Full Support |
| ```
translate-y-{n}
``` | ✅ Full Support |
| ```
translate-y-[n]
``` | ✅ Full Support |
